# Arcane Armor Mastery (Feat)
## Overview
You have learned how to cast spells while wearing armor.

**Prerequisites**: [[Armor Proficiency, Light (Feat)|Light Armor Proficiency]], caster level 3rd.

**Benefit**: As a swift action, reduce the arcane spell failure chance due to the armor you are wearing by 10% for any spells you cast this round.

**Note:** This feat can be taken as a fighter bonus feat.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 118
